name: karmaparty
description: Karma Party - Socially Impactful Retail Parties!
author: Spencer Neilan

scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=$npm_package_config_env_name ENV_FILE=$npm_package_config_env_file HOST=localhost PORT=3040 nuxt
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=$npm_package_config_env_name ENV_FILE=$npm_package_config_env_file HOST=0.0.0.0 PORT=3030 node server/server.js
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=$npm_package_config_env_name ENV_FILE=$npm_package_config_env_file nuxt build && yarn build:copy:ssr && yarn build:copy:public
scripts.build:copy:public: rimraf public/* && mkdirp public/_nuxt && cp -a .nuxt/dist/client/. public/_nuxt && cp -a src/static/. public/
scripts.build:copy:ssr: rimraf functions/ssr && mkdirp functions/ssr && cp -R .nuxt/dist functions/ssr/dist
